div.div: The location of the 5% hotspots of forest species.
div.p: Hotspots are based on the overall habitat suitability index of species in 1971–2000 (A) and in 2051–2080 according to the three scenarios: B = CSIRO, B1; C = 19GCM ensemble mean, A1B; D = MIROC, A2. The southern boreal zone = olive, the middle boreal zone = yellow, the northern boreal zone = light yellow.
